name: The Center of the Universe
description:
When a freak storm that is more than just a storm forces Garrah to take cover, the world they emerge into is one quite unlike their own: ours. 

Unsure where this new path takes them and stuck communicating with a rudimentary understanding of the few bits of language that bind them, the sisters Xochitl and Precious take them in and give them just a glimpse of a life that's slightly different. Like two ships passing the in the night. Two worlds touching at a distance. 

 10 endings, ~15k words
